text: Princess Muna Al-Hussein (, born Toni Avril Gardiner; 25 April 1941) is the mother of King Abdullah II of Jordan. She was the second wife of King Hussein. The couple divorced on 21 December 1972. She is British by birth, and changed her name to Muna Al-Hussein after her royal marriage. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Jordanian princes and princesses
title: Princess Muna al-Hussein
